name: Sasui: A journey of love
description:
Sasui: A journey of love is a student-made immersive game that follows the 12th century Sindhi story of estranged lovers, Sasui and Punnhun, as a metaphor for the human soul’s search for the divine through the verses of Sufi saint, Shah Abdul Latif Bhittai. The game and original tale are both set in what are the provinces of Sindh and Baluchistan in modern-day Pakistan. Unlock Bhittai’s verses and find your beloved.

Our website for more information on ourselves and the game.
